thread.title: Natasha Hamilton and Ritchie Neville are set to tie the knot - after a nerve-racking proposal
thread.title_full: Natasha Hamilton and Ritchie Neville are set to tie the knot - after a nerve-racking proposal

title: Natasha Hamilton and Ritchie Neville are set to tie the knot - after a nerve-racking proposal
text:
Natasha Hamilton and Ritchie Neville are set to tie the knot - after a nerve-racking proposal Natasha Hamilton and Ritchie Neville are set to tie the knot - after a nerve-racking proposal 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
It’s a match made in pop heaven – Atomic Kitten star Natasha Hamilton has announced her engagement to Five singer Ritchie Neville. 
The couple, who already have a one-year-old daughter called Ella together, have decided to tie the knot. 
They announced their news in this week’s edition of OK! magazine, after Ritchie proposed in Rome’s Villa Borghese Gardens. 
Natasha, who also has three other children – Josh, Harry and Alfie – tweeted a photo of the magazine’s front cover, sharing her good news. So…..our news is now out! @RitchieNeville asked me to Marry Him😊 read all about it in this weeks @OK_Magazine X pic.twitter.com/tlKL1Slf2L 
— Natasha Hamilton (@NatashaOfficial) October 26, 2015 
According to the Daily Mirror, Ritchie revealed how, despite all his planning, last-minute nerves still kicked in. 
He said: “I knew I was about to do it and then all of a sudden I started shaking and adrenaline was rushing through my body.” 
Talking about her ring, she said: “It’s beautiful. He couldn’t have picked a more perfect ring.” Ritchie Neville and Natasha Hamilton (Dominic Lipinski/PA) 
She added: “We were sobbing as I said ‘Yes!’… It was so romantic and it couldn’t have been more perfect. I felt overwhelmed and like I was in a movie.” 
The newly-engaged couple headed to La Pergola, a Michelin-starred restaurant in Rome, where they slow danced to Frank Sinatra on the roof terrace and stayed until they were the last people there at the end of the night. So yep, popped the question and @NatashaOfficial and I will be getting a bit married. Check out @OK_Magazine to hear all about Rome trip. :) 
— Ritchie Neville (@RitchieNeville) October 26, 2015 
Natasha and Ritchie don’t plan to tie the knot until 2017. 
The two started dating after they both appeared on reality TV show The Big Reunion in 2013. 
Earlier this year Natasha competed on Celebrity Big Brother and made it into the final three, coming in as runner-up to Austin Armacost and winner James Hill. Share article Natasha Hamilton (Jon Enoch/Channel Five) Promoted Stories
